body_html:
I found that setting the MKLROOT environment variable to point to the local conda environment directory fixes the issue.

MKLROOT="${HOME}/.conda/envs/${ENV_NAME}/" \
MAX_JOBS=12 \
python setup.py install

body:
I found that setting the `MKLROOT` environment variable to point to the local conda environment directory fixes the issue.

```
MKLROOT="${HOME}/.conda/envs/${ENV_NAME}/" \
MAX_JOBS=12 \
python setup.py install
```
